comments: Previous terms are concatenated into one large integer. Next terms are 184, 420, 958 and 2194 digits long.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Look and Say Sequence
prog: (Haskell)a045982 n = a045982_list !! (n-1)a045982_list = 1 : f [1] where   f xs = y : f (xs ++ [y]) where     y = a045918 $ read (concatMap show xs)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 28 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1999.
